InstructionA: Select the anvil button to begin salvaging.
ItemIsEquippedWarning: This action will irreversibly destroy one or more equipped items. Are you sure you want to do this?
ResultBonus: The highly salvageable item also gave you {s1}.
ReturnedGems: Socketed gems were returned to your inventory.
SalvageAllJunkWarning: This action will irreversibly destroy all items marked as junk in your inventory. Are you sure you want to do this?
SalvageAllMagicWarning: This action will irreversibly destroy all magic items in your inventory. Are you sure you want to do this?
SalvageAllMagicWarningSigils: This action will irreversibly destroy all sacred Nightmare Sigils in your inventory. Are you sure you want to do this?
SalvageAllNormalWarning: This action will irreversibly destroy all normal items in your inventory. Are you sure you want to do this?
SalvageAllNormalWarningSigils: This action will irreversibly destroy all common Nightmare Sigils in your inventory. Are you sure you want to do this?
SalvageAllRareWarning: This action will irreversibly destroy all rare items in your inventory. Are you sure you want to do this?
SalvageAllRareWarningSigils: This action will irreversibly destroy all ancestral Nightmare Sigils in your inventory. Are you sure you want to do this?
SalvageAllScrapWarning: This action will irreversibly destroy all scrap items in your inventory. Are you sure you want to do this?
SalvageAllWarning: This action will irreversibly destroy all normal, magic, and rare items in your inventory. Are you sure you want to do this?
SalvageAllWarningSigils: This action will irreversibly destroy all sacred and ancestral Nightmare Sigils in your inventory. Are you sure you want to do this?
Warning: Are you sure you want to destroy this item?
